# shadcnagents

> Copy-paste Vercel AI SDK components and agent patterns for Next.js. generateText, streamText, tool calling, AI agents, orchestration, and more. Built with AI SDK v6, shadcn/ui, and TypeScript.

shadcnagents is a component registry of 87+ production-ready "stacks" â€” full vertical slices (UI + API route + types + dependencies) that you install with one CLI command via the shadcn CLI. Each stack demonstrates a specific Vercel AI SDK pattern with a live interactive preview.

## Tech Stack

- Next.js v16 with Turbopack
- Vercel AI SDK v6
- React 19
- Tailwind CSS v4
- TypeScript
- shadcn/ui components

## Installation

```
npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnagents.com/r/<stack-name>.json
```

## Key Pages

- Homepage: https://shadcnagents.com
- All Stacks: https://shadcnagents.com/stacks
- Documentation: https://shadcnagents.com/docs
- Pricing: https://shadcnagents.com/pricing

## Stack Categories (8)

- **Foundations** (9 stacks): generateText, streamText, generateImage, generateSpeech, transcribe, tool calling, agent setup
- **Agent Architecture** (10 stacks): Routing, orchestrator-worker, sub-agent orchestrator, evaluator-optimizer, multi-step tools, parallel processing, human-in-the-loop
- **Starter Apps** (8 stacks): ChatGPT clone, Claude clone, form generator, data analysis agent, branding agent, SEO audit
- **Rich Output** (11 stacks): Tables, charts, JSON renders, streaming markdown, artifact canvas, structured output, web preview
- **Connectors** (8 stacks): Claude/Exa web search, Firecrawl/Cheerio/Jina scrapers, PDF analysis
- **Pipelines** (7 stacks): Sequential, evaluator, orchestrator, parallel, routing workflows, few-shot editor
- **Chat Kit** (20 stacks): Chat interfaces, reasoning display, sources & citations, plan display, tool approval, voice input, model selector, token counter, multimodal upload, history sidebar
- **Landing Blocks** (12 stacks): Bento layouts, code blocks, feature grids, model comparisons, integration showcases, ROI calculator, changelog

## Pricing

- **Free**: 36 open source stacks, MIT licensed
- **Pro** ($149 lifetime): All 87+ stacks, agent patterns, orchestration, human-in-the-loop workflows, full-stack templates, priority updates

## Detailed Listing

For a complete list of all stacks with descriptions, see: https://shadcnagents.com/llms-full.txt
